entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as receiving birthday cakes and eating grapefruit. He is also described as looking forward to a real breakfast.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as sending Harry a birthday cake.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as sending Harry a birthday cake.

entities.name: ha grid
entities.description: Ha grid is mentioned as sending Harry a birthday cake. Note: This name seems to be misspelled in the text, possibly it should be 'Hagrid'.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as sending Harry a birthday cake.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as laying aside his paper and looking down at his grapefruit quarter. He also gets up to answer the doorbell.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as giving Uncle Vernon a severe look and nodding at Dudley.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as finishing his grapefruit quarter and eyeing Harry's with a sour look.

relationships.description: Harry received a birthday cake from Ron.
Harry received a birthday cake from Hermione.
Harry received a birthday cake from Ha grid (possibly Hagrid).
Harry received a birthday cake from Sirius.
Dudley eyed Harry's grapefruit with a sour look, indicating he envied Harry's food.
